website_summaries.verdict: This versatile laptop offers plenty of power for tasks like Photoshop or gaming. The 17.3-inch screen looks great and can be upgraded to a touchscreen for a low price.
pros: Sports a 10th-generation Intel i7 processor and 16GB RAM
The 17.3-inch FHD display is crisp and bright
cons: Top-of-the-line price, and not ideal for those who aren’t techies or well-versed in a variety of programs

customer_reviews.title: Fast, high quality laptop.  Premiem features such as the NVME ssd make it worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: I have never bothered to write a review before, but this laptop deserves one. I use this laptop for office programs, internet, and occasionally some CAD software. The preinstalled windows 10 pro worked great right out of the box. No messing around with disks and drivers. Startup each time is instant from sleep mode, and super quick from complete shut off. I like the keyboard, touchpad, and touchscreen on this laptop. I also really love with the fingerprint sensor. Who knew how convenient that could be! Laptop also arrived quickly (ordered on Sunday, arrived Wednesday) All in all, this was just a great experience. I am very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Lehman

customer_reviews.title: Stunningly beautiful and powerful
customer_reviews.text: The HP Envy with the new intel Core i7 10th gen processor is simply a stunningly beautiful laptop with tons of power under the hood. I am not a professional reviewer or influencer, I just love my new laptop. Outstanding value, could not be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff C.

customer_reviews.title: Great computer, just pricey
customer_reviews.text: The laptop is a great computer, however it is pricier than other options. If you need to buy the computer right away, then amazon might be a good choice. However it does pay to shop around (Saying it from personal experience.)
customer_reviews.author: SwampLife

customer_reviews.title: Mic not working
customer_reviews.text: Laptop is exactly what I expected and more. It is really fast and elegant. I don't think I've had a faster laptop in my life. The one thing I discovered that wasn't working is the built in microphone. If you use headphones the microphone can hear you. So, this will be either a permanent issue or I'll wait for a driver update or some other HP support solution.
customer_reviews.author: Miro Georgiev

customer_reviews.title: Great Tech Support
customer_reviews.text: After one week, ran into issue with laptop. Best technical support experience ever! Very knowledgeable, patient, and dedicated to making sure everything was working as it should! Would definitely purchase from them again!! S.H.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop - FRAUDULENT ADVERTISING - states that it includes "HP Premium Warranty"
customer_reviews.text: Laptop itself is the phenomenal performance you'd expect from HP. The vendor (LGI Electronics Inc )misrepresents this product in that their ad states it includes an "HP Premium Warranty". When you register this machine, you get a standard HP 1 year warranty. HP has a Care Pack" that is $289 additional coverage. This is false or misleading information, I will pursue this vendor (LGI Electronics Inc - an "HP Partner", for what that is worth) until satisfaction. Review is of the product you pay for - a laptop and a premium warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Alan S. Mathias

customer_reviews.title: A very nice computer, and a needed upgrade from my older HP
customer_reviews.text: I really like this computer, it's fast, although the Solid State drive doesn't seem, to me, to be any faster at pulling up files when I click on them. In fact, it seems a little slower. The transfer of files from my older HP was fairly easy, something I usually dread. The backlit, proximity sensing keyboard is really a nice feature. I probably won't use the touch screen much. The real test of this machine's utility- will be when I install the new Moicrosoft Flight Simulator 2020 on it in a few weeks. All in all, a really good deal from the seller, I got more ram, and it was less than at Best Buy.
customer_reviews.author: LHBassist

customer_reviews.title: I am very unhappy
customer_reviews.text: Bad battery life. Powerless screen. Poor screen quality, black spots on the black screen at the top
customer_reviews.author: Sergejs Vasiljevs

customer_reviews.title: Powerful Machine Borderline Useless Trackpad
customer_reviews.text: The trackpad on this HP is garbage. It couldn't possibly have cost more than a penny to manufacture. I have another HP Laptop and the the trackpad on that one is just as bad. They keys are made of some horribly cheap feeling plastic, but they get the job done. I'll still rate it a 5 overall as the screen looks quite good and it is powerful with the latest generation I7 and sufficient memory. The track pad is disgusting though. Utterly disgusting.
customer_reviews.author: J.G.

customer_reviews.title: Poor Battery life but great otherwise
customer_reviews.text: Update: I have had the item for about a month now and am very disappointed in the battery life 😔 I have only had the laptop for 2 days now but I have played a game on it, customized it and used internet. I mostly will be using it for my real estate career and my boyfriends photo editing; however, it is great for everything. Set up went smoothly, reads my fingerprint and my boyfriends great! The screen is beautiful and bright and it is way faster than my lenovo yoga I had previously.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Super Value
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a replacement for a much older and heavier one. Very happy with the speed, weight, and all features. The Solid-state drive makes things noticeably faster.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Crow

customer_reviews.title: CD Drive for the HP Envy 17.3 inch screen was inoperative
customer_reviews.text: The CD drive provided for the HP Envy 17.3 inch computer was initially unable to interface with the computer. Physically you were able to install and remove a CD disk; however the software interface was NON existent. I was unable to download software programs from a CD disk. By contacting HP the problem was eliminated. Unfortunately in my haste I purchased, and to my chagrin, a software program for $150.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No fan noise, very little hard drive activity
customer_reviews.text: I have few complaints about this computer. Yes, the half-width cursor keys are annoying, but I have never owned a computer that didn't have annoyances. What I looked for was a computer whose reviewers weren't complaining big time about noisy fan and drive activity. This computer is very, very quiet. HP driver and BIOS upgrades have gone smoothly thus far. Over the past few months, Windows 10 updates have gone well. The computer never feels hot (although it did get warm when I left a book laying on it). And it looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: lj

customer_reviews.title: Love my laptop!
customer_reviews.text: I love my laptop! The battery doesn't seem to hold for more than a couple of hours with constant use, but that's ok I use it at home only anyway. Speed is great, graphics are great and overall happy. Amazing seller, and great communication! Thank you so much!
customer_reviews.author: Vicki

customer_reviews.title: Easy to setup and Use
customer_reviews.text: I really love this laptop. It arrived within 24 hours of ordering and was very easy to setup and to remove the software that I didn't want or need. I haven't come across anything that I couldn't resolve through the online manual or user forums. I usually use a desktop for work, but am seriously considering using the laptop going forward as it does all I need it to as well as screen mirroring. It's quick and comfortable, although as other reviews have mentioned it can be a little heavy, but that's the only complaint I have to this point.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Ramsey

customer_reviews.title: Not even 3 days
customer_reviews.text: I have been an HP fan for years and never had ANY issues until this laptop.....2 days after I got it keeps giving a boot error. I have tried resetting it back to manufacture settings and for 4 hours it just gave the hp symbol and the twirling circle. 4 HOURS and this is after I did the reset. Now I have reset computers before and they NEVER take this long. The program for quick driver updates is what did it. I wish companies would leave the option to install programs like these instead of throwing them in. I will be returning this for another......sigh
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: I'm very happy with the HP Envy
customer_reviews.text: Love the backlit keyboard and the touchscreen. This desktop replacement is a good size, decent speakers and feels both solid and light. The screen is beautiful and performance is very fast (compared to the i3 and even the i5).
customer_reviews.author: Joy Anderson

customer_reviews.title: What a Beast
customer_reviews.text: I was using a 6 year old hp laptop with win 7 on it and was happy. After windows quit updating the win 7 I knew it was time to upgrade. Glad I did. This computer is FAST both in shutting down and starting up. Almost instant. More pleased with win 10 than I thought I would be. Does everything I want in a computer and I am very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Speedy J

customer_reviews.title: Very fast and durable
customer_reviews.text: Graphics are great. Very fast replacing a generation 3 Intel I7. Will hold a second drive but need to get the cable. If purchasing get the 1TB M.2 drive. This has 512GB and fills up fast. I do Inkscape, GIMP, Illustrator, and Photoshop and the graphics GPU is a blessing. The USBS 3.1 makes data transfer to external drives quick. Has a switch to disable camera which is nice. Just wish it has a BluRay vice DVD. Excellent value for price.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy Cimorelli

customer_reviews.title: Good labtop. Terrible battery
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping,good labtop. Just the battery is very week. They need to remove that 10 hour battery part on the thing, that's very overexaturated . More like 2-3 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie N.

customer_reviews.title: super hp laptop
customer_reviews.text: 10th generation laptop super fast, super sharp colors,so a little too expensive I think it is worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love this laptop. I went in for a pricier purchase because i wanted to run demanding games. The laptop performs perfect, my games look great, downloading is fast, touch screen hasn't glitched. The fingerprint reader sometimes can't recognize me, but other than that everything works great. It runs fast, never overheats. Im really satisfied with it. And the acreen quality is impressive!
customer_reviews.author: Gracy

customer_reviews.title: Neopack 64GB Flash Drive not included
customer_reviews.text: Neopack 64GB Flash Drive should be included in this package, but only PC and power cable were in the box.
customer_reviews.author: Masashi Tsuji

customer_reviews.title: Zippy
customer_reviews.text: Instant wake up like a tablet. Very capable machine. All new and sealed. Very fast start up from shut down. DVD burner. SD card reader, HDMI, 3 USB. Nice screen with a nice sound bar the width of the machine.
customer_reviews.author: jaudet71

customer_reviews.title: Poor Battery Life.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the laptop so far. My major complaint is the battery life. It only lasts about 3 1/2 to 4 hours. It drains out really quickly. I thought it was suppose to last up to 9 hours. Big difference!! Something is wrong. Everything else is working as described in product description.
customer_reviews.author: DBora

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I love this computer. I've been in it for over a decade. Out of the box AND after many resource intense programs, consistently fast to start up and running.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Good product. Love screen size and speed
customer_reviews.text: Good computer Very fast start up and shut down. Unable to change battery with slightly above average life Despite that we own 2 Good product
customer_reviews.author: Rick Smith

customer_reviews.title: Quick start up time!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome laptop. I am very happy. However, the new and improved battery life seems to not be much better. Maybe in time it will improve.
customer_reviews.author: hootfour

customer_reviews.title: These guys customer service is the best!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I called HP support to do the setup with this computer, as for some reason it couldn't "see" my network, and left me with "you'll have to call the IT provider". Frank at Tech Warehouse had it running in no time at all, and was very gracious to offer other setup help with tools I didnt even buy as part of this purchase. In short, if you want "THE BEST" Customer Service, these guys, Tech Warehouse is the way to go! They don't stop until you are 100% SATISFIED!!!!! WILL ABSOLUTELY BUY FROM THEM AGAIN!!!
customer_reviews.author: Joey D.

customer_reviews.title: HP Fast!
customer_reviews.text: Very fast start up & response in this laptop! Also, very light and easy to work with. SSD drive works well and no problems. My old laptop was getting erratic at times. Was a good upgrade to me. I would recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: Terry W.

customer_reviews.title: Really nice computer
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a replacement for my previous HP Envy, which was top notch. After you remove all the bloatware, this is a tremendous computer.
customer_reviews.author: Nelson A.

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop!
customer_reviews.text: Just as described.. Great product.. Did NOT disappoint..I use it every day.. very happy with this laptop.. not one issue!!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Davis

customer_reviews.title: Not Functioning Well.
customer_reviews.text: Fingerprint reader doesn’t work Computer has glitches. I’m sorry to have to give a low rating, as I myself, looked forward to receiving this computer and begin using it based on the description. I read Someone posted this comes with a built in dvd drive. It doesn’t. Please don’t get confused on this- it’s unclear in the question asked and answered from the description.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Horrible experience: “lemon product“
customer_reviews.text: Defective “lemon“ product, horrible experience: Less than 24 hours out of the box, I received a fatal blue screen, then the laptop didn’t want to power up. The seller couldn’t resolve, HP technical support couldn’t resolve. Tried to make arrangements for expedited replacement, but the seller became difficult to deal with and got very rude. The manager avoided me. Avoid.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Avery

customer_reviews.title: Need help with set up
customer_reviews.text: The computer arrived without any manual and I had, and still having problems logging on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yaaaaaas!
customer_reviews.text: Took a while to get use to but once I got to organizing and playing with the new Edge I absolutely love this laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Lazz

customer_reviews.title: Great but temperamental computer.
customer_reviews.text: Great computer. However it does frequently freeze and requires waiting for the battery to run out of power to shut down. Does then restart without a problem.
customer_reviews.author: R. Ryun

customer_reviews.title: Must have been a Lemon
customer_reviews.text: Three or Four Keys didn’t work unless you hit them 4-5 times Then it wouldn’t start up after a week?
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy With This Laptop!
customer_reviews.text: It boots up in eleven seconds, fingerprint reader works well, runs fast and runs wifi great at high speeds up to 500!
customer_reviews.author: Sevarg

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Works very fast, I love 16 gigs of ram in a quick HP. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny Bayside

customer_reviews.title: Nice computer
customer_reviews.text: It is fast, although kind of heavy for a SD drive.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really fast
customer_reviews.text: Still playing with it I'll let you know in a little while
customer_reviews.author: misterv

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this laptop.  Better getcha one.
customer_reviews.text: Very slim. Soft touch keyboard is great. Screen is easy to see. Reflections are minimal.
customer_reviews.author: Caron Keller

customer_reviews.title: Best Ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the smoothest, nicest Laptop I have had so far. I love it! Clear screen.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth C.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: I have had it two days and love the performance. Handles my needs perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Great computer
customer_reviews.text: The first time I've spent this much on a laptop, and it's great. I use a few software applications simultaneously and everything works very smoothly. I'd definitely recommend this to anyone for the price range.
customer_reviews.author: sean m cosgrove

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: Super fast processor good graphics high def screen great sound awesome laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Soway

customer_reviews.title: Very fast
customer_reviews.text: This is really great machine. I feel my job as a easy peezy now
customer_reviews.author: Alberto Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and well made. A little on the heavy side.
customer_reviews.text: Business use. Very fast. Excellent keyboard and good touchpad placement.
customer_reviews.author: Barry Mangan

customer_reviews.title: Fast speed cpu
customer_reviews.text: Good machine fast and reliable the battery seems that doesn't last as promised specially with heavy duties.
customer_reviews.author: Javier

customer_reviews.title: Fast sleek and easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Great computer for the price. Screen very clear and vibrant; Easy to set up and fast. Arrived quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Berkshire Training and Employment, Inc

customer_reviews.title: Its been a very nice laptop. I use it for work 8 hours a day.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice laptop. Never received the flash drive? Otherwise it would be a 5.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Packard

customer_reviews.title: amazing
customer_reviews.text: great customer service easy to deal with worth every dollar
customer_reviews.author: J saf

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: This laptop shipped fast and is a power full computer that handles graffics easily.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Very good, but size large
customer_reviews.text: Just size, it will really matter to you as it's big size and not very likely to be portable
customer_reviews.author: Hassan

customer_reviews.title: HP Envy 2019,17.3" Full HD Touch, i7-10510U 10th gen Quad CPU
customer_reviews.text: I have an older one and it was getting so slow that I wanted to upgrade and this one was a great replacement. I would recommend it to someone that is using it all the time. It may be expensive to someone that don't use it all the time like I do.
customer_reviews.author: Termite

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: My daughter love's it it was a Christmas gift made her smile set it up in minutes she's quick when it comes to her computers She has 3 and this one is her favorite so far😂
customer_reviews.author: James S.

product_meta.title: HP Envy 2019,17.3" Full HD Touch, i7-10510U 10th gen Quad CPU,NVIDIA MX250(4GB), 1TB SSD NVME,16GB RAM,Win 10 Pro Pre-Installed by HP, Neopack 64GB Flash Drive, B&O Speakers, HP Premium Wty, No DVD Rw
product_meta.description: Capacity:1TBA PROPER PERFORMANCE POWERHOUSE THAT TURNS HEADS Whether you’re a business professional that demands reliable performance, a content creator that puts a premium on pixels, or a student looking for an all-round machine they can count on, this 10th generation i7 laptop delivers power without compromise. Configured to supercharge your productivity, engineered for immersive entertainment, and styled to make a statement, this HP Envy 17t is more than just a laptop, it’s a lifestyle upgrade. Premium Performance 10th generation Intel Core i7-10510U (1.8 GHz, up to 4.9 GHz, 8 MB cache, 4 cores) NVIDIA GeForce MX250 (4 GBGDDR5) 16 GB DDR4-2666 SDRAM (2x8GB) 1TB GB Intel SSD. Crystal Clear Display Meets Immersive Audio 17.3" diagonal FHD WLED UWVA (1920x1080) Touchscreen functionality. 3-way micro-edge display. Bang & Olufsen, quad speakers, HP audio boost. Built to Stun Premium aluminum and Gorilla glass screen. Full-size island-style backlit keyboard with integrated numeric keypad. Lifted hinge for ergonomic typing. All-Day Battery 3-cell, 52 Wh Lithium-ion prismatic Battery. The Latest in Connectivity Intel 802.11b/g/n/ac (2x2) Wi-Fi Bluetooth 5 Combo (MU-MIMO supported) HP Wide Vision HD Webcam with Dual Digital Microphone. No Optical DVD drive. Cutting-Edge Security Privacy camera kill switch. HP BIOS Recovery. Installed Software Windows 10 Home Pro OS. Experience performance without compromise with the latest HP Envy 17t!
feature_bullets: PACKED WITH POWER: 10th Generation Intel Core i7-10510U (1.8 GHz, up to 4.9 GHz, 8 MB cache, 4 cores)+NVIDIA GeForce MX250 (4 GB GDDR5). 1 x headphone/microphone combo; 1 x USB 3.1 Gen 1 (HP Sleep and Charge); 2 x USB 3.1 Gen 1 (Data transfer only). No DVD Drive

MULTI-TASK WITH EASE, BETTER THAN THE REST: The New 2019 Envy 17T is one of the Best 17" Laptops on the Market with its Features, 16GB DDR4 MEMORY, powered by WINDOWS 10 PRO(Pre-Installed by HP), Enjoy even faster performance with the 1TB PCIe NVMe M.2 SSD that comes on board. 16GB DDR4-2666 SDRAM(2x8GB) makes this Intel i7 HP Envy 17t laptop perfect for multitasking and running multiple programs seamlessly.

EXPANSIVE 17” FD TOUCHSCREEN: 17.3" diagonal FHD Anti-Glare WLED UWVA (1920x1080) multi-touch-enabled edge-to-edge glass (1920 x 1080) and Intel 802.11b/g/n/ac (2x2) Wi-Fi and Bluetooth 5 Combo(MU-MIMO supported). Watch your videos and pictures come to life on the 17.3" diagonal FHD WLED UWVA (1920x1080) touch screen. HP speakers custom-tuned by experts at Bang & Olufsen produce rich audio.

PREMIUM AESTHETICS: Make a statement whenever you work with your HP touchscreen laptop. You’ll love the aluminum build that creates sleek durability, the full-size backlit keyboard with integrated numeric keypad, and the lifting hinge for ergonomic typing.

ALL-DAY BATTERY: Stay unplugged for up to 10 hours courtesy of the 3-cell 52 Wh Li-ion prismatic battery, and enjoy crystal-clear communication with the HP Wide Vision HD Webcam with Dual Digital Microphone

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars173 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
